00027 namespace Utilities.Web.Email.MIME.CodeTypes

00032     public class CodeBase:Code

00038         public CodeBase()
00039         {
00040         }

00043         #region Public Overridden Functions
00044         public override void Decode(string Input, out string Output)
00045         {
00046             Output = "";
00047             int Index = 0;
00048             while(Index<Input.Length)
00049             {
00050                 int CurrentIndex=Input.IndexOf("=?",Index);
00051                 if(CurrentIndex!=-1)
00052                 {
00053                     Output+=Input.Substring(Index,CurrentIndex-Index);
00054                     int CurrentIndex2 = Input.IndexOf("?=", CurrentIndex + 2);
00055                     if(CurrentIndex2!=-1)
00056                     {
00057                         CurrentIndex+=2;
00058                         int CurrentIndex3 = Input.IndexOf('?', CurrentIndex);
00059                         if(CurrentIndex3!=-1&&Input[CurrentIndex3+2]=='?')
00060                         {
00061                             CharacterSet=Input.Substring(CurrentIndex,CurrentIndex3-CurrentIndex);
00062                             string DECString=Input.Substring(CurrentIndex3+3,CurrentIndex2-CurrentIndex3-3);
00063                             if(Input[CurrentIndex3+1]=='Q')
00064                             {
00065                                 Code TempCode=CodeManager.Instance["quoted-printable"];
00066                                 TempCode.CharacterSet=CharacterSet;
00067                                 string TempString="";
00068                                 TempCode.Decode(DECString,out TempString);
00069                                 Output+=TempString;
00070                             }
00071                             else if(Input[CurrentIndex3+1]=='B')
00072                             {
00073                                 Code TempCode=CodeManager.Instance["base64"];
00074                                 TempCode.CharacterSet=CharacterSet;
00075                                 string TempString="";
00076                                 TempCode.Decode(DECString,out TempString);
00077                                 Output+=TempString;
00078                             }
00079                             else
00080                             {
00081                                 Output+=DECString;
00082                             }
00083                         }
00084                         else
00085                         {
00086                             Output+=Input.Substring(CurrentIndex3,CurrentIndex2-CurrentIndex3);
00087                         }
00088                         Index=CurrentIndex2+2;
00089                     }
00090                     else
00091                     {
00092                         Output+=Input.Substring(CurrentIndex,Input.Length-CurrentIndex);
00093                         break;
00094                     }
00095                 }
00096                 else
00097                 {
00098                     Output+=Input.Substring(Index,Input.Length-Index);
00099                     break;
00100                 }
00101             }
00102         }
00103 
00104         public override string Encode(string Input)
00105         {
00106             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00107             if (DelimeterNeeded)
00108             {
00109                 Builder.Append(EncodeDelimeter(Input));
00110             }
00111             else
00112             {
00113                 Builder.Append(EncodeNoDelimeter(Input));
00114             }
00115 
00116             if (IsAutoFold)
00117             {
00118                 string[] FoldCharacters = this.FoldCharacters;
00119                 foreach (string FoldCharacter in FoldCharacters)
00120                 {
00121                     string NewFoldString = FoldCharacter + "\r\n\t";
00122                     Builder.Replace(FoldCharacter, NewFoldString);
00123                 }
00124             }
00125             return Builder.ToString();
00126         }
00127         #endregion

00141         protected virtual bool IsAutoFold
00142         {
00143             get { return false; }
00144         }

00149         protected virtual bool DelimeterNeeded
00150         {
00151             get { return false; }

00157         protected virtual char[] DelimeterCharacters
00158         {
00159             get { return null; }
00160         }
00161         #endregion

00163         #region Protected Functions

00165 
00166

00169         protected string EncodeDelimeter(string Input)
00170         {
00171             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00172             char[] Filter = DelimeterCharacters;
00173             string[] InputArray = Input.Split(Filter);
00174             int Index = 0;
00175             foreach (string TempString in InputArray)
00176             {
00177                 if (TempString != null)
00178                 {
00179                     Index += TempString.Length;
00180                     if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(CharacterSet))
00181                     {
00182                         CharacterSet = System.Text.Encoding.Default.BodyName;
00183                     }
00184                     string EncodingUsing = SelectEncoding(Input).ToLower();
00185                     if (EncodingUsing.Equals("non", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00186                     {
00187                         Builder.Append(TempString);
00188                     }
00189                     else if (EncodingUsing.Equals("base64", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)
00190                         || EncodingUsing.Equals("quoted-printable", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00191                     {
00192                         Code TempCode = CodeManager.Instance[EncodingUsing];
00193                         TempCode.CharacterSet = CharacterSet;
00194                         Builder.AppendFormat("=?{0}?Q?{1}?=", CharacterSet, TempCode.Encode(TempString));
00195                     }
00196                     if (Index < Input.Length)
00197                         Builder.Append(Input.Substring(Index, 1));
00198                     ++Index;
00199                 }
00200             }
00201             return Builder.ToString();
00202         }
00203 
00209         protected string EncodeNoDelimeter(string Input)
00210         {
00211             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00212             if(string.IsNullOrEmpty(CharacterSet))
00213                 CharacterSet = System.Text.Encoding.Default.BodyName;
00214 
00215             string EncodingUsing = SelectEncoding(Input).ToLower();
00216             if (EncodingUsing.Equals("non", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00217             {
00218                 Builder.Append(Input);
00219             }
00220             else if (EncodingUsing.Equals("base64", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase)
00221                         || EncodingUsing.Equals("quoted-printable", StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00222             {
00223                 Code TempCode = CodeManager.Instance[EncodingUsing];
00224                 TempCode.CharacterSet = CharacterSet;
00225                 Builder.AppendFormat("=?{0}?Q?{1}?=", CharacterSet, TempCode.Encode(Input));
00226             }
00227             return Builder.ToString();
00228         }
00229 
00235         protected string SelectEncoding(string Input)
00236         {
00237             int NumberOfNonASCII = 0;
00238             for (int x = 0; x < Input.Length; ++x)
00239             {
00240                 if (IsNonASCIICharacter(Input[x]))
00241                     ++NumberOfNonASCII;
00242             }
00243             if (NumberOfNonASCII == 0)
00244                 return "non";
00245             int QuotableSize = Input.Length + NumberOfNonASCII * 2;
00246             int Base64Size = (Input.Length + 2) / 3 * 4;
00247             return (QuotableSize <= Base64Size || NumberOfNonASCII * 5 <= Input.Length) ? "quoted-printable" : "base64";
00248         }
00249 
00255         protected bool IsNonASCIICharacter(char Input)
00256         {
00257             return (int)Input > 255;
00258         }
00259         #endregion
00260     }
